headline.main: WRECK OF THE SAN FRANCISCO.; Additional Details of the Sad Disaster. Arrival of the Lucy Thompson, with Passengers saved by the Kilby. INTERESTING NARRATIVES BY SURVIVORS Statements of Mr. and Mrs. Col. Gates. NARRATIVE OF J. LORIMER GRAHAM, JR. Statement of the First Assistant Engineer. Interesting Statements of the Captain and Mate of the Lucy Thompson. Sufferings on board the Kilby, from Hunger. INTERESTING INCIDENTS, REMINISCENCES, &C Statement of the Chief Mate of the Lucy Thompson. WRECK OF THE SAN FRANCISCO.

docs.lead_paragraph: We published in successive editions of the DAILY TIMES on Saturday, very full details of the sad disaster to the San Francisco. During the day our reporters visited the ship Three Bells, and called also upon several of the officers and others who were rescued by her from the wreck, and obtained from them very full particulars of all the incidents of this dreadful catastrophe. On Saturday evening the ship Lucy Thompson, Capt.
